person.persName: Thomas Pitts Hitch (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Pitts Hitch and Sarah Sanders Bryant Hitch. Married to Lucinda Pickerell Hitch. Father of Samary Hitch, Cinerva Hitch, James H. Hitch, and Susan Hitch. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.
